        Initialize the system property. Note that when using the default file path, the passed object will be of type UnmodifiableProperties, and when using a custom file path, the object will be of type Properties

      • getMaxTaskSize

        public int getMaxTaskSize()
        The recommended maximum photo count in a single task. Value is never 0, and less than 0 if the limit is disabled.
        Returns:
        the maxTaskSize

      • getScheduleTaskDelay

        public long getScheduleTaskDelay()
        The default task schedule delay. The tasks should be scheduled to start immediately if the value is less than 1.
        Returns:
        the scheduleTaskDelay

      • getPropertyFilePath

        public java.lang.String getPropertyFilePath()
        Description copied from class: SystemProperty
        By default, this returns null. On null value, the default system property file will be used. If non-null value is provided, the path will be used to load the requested properties.
        Overrides:
        getPropertyFilePath in class SystemProperty
        Returns:
        the path of the configuration file for this Property
